company.name: POPS Worldwide
company.description:
POPS Worldwide - Leading Digital Entertainment in Southeast Asia

POPS Worldwide is the leading digital entertainment company and headquartered in Vietnam. As a pioneer in the field of digital entertainment, POPS have become the digital entertainment network of choice amongst the entertainment community worldwide with hundreds of channels from all types of content from music, comedy, short films, beauty, news, game shows. Working directly with our partners, POPS Worldwide advocates for the intellectual property of its partner, helping them market, distribute and monetize their work.

Our mission is to be the leading digital entertainment company in Southeast Asia, POPS is always looking for outstanding talent to join the team ? people who are passionate, innovative, creative and dedicated. At POPS, you will find significant career growth opportunities in a fast-paced industry and gain invaluable experience.
